name: HEX (itch) (JakeMakesGames)
description:
* UPDATED DURING RATING PERIOD TO REMOVE AN UNECCESARY FILE FROM THE .ZIP *

If Super Hexagon had a baby with a Top Down Shooter, this would be it!
HEX is a fast-paced, high action arcade shooter I made in 3 days for the Minimalist Game Jam!

CONTROLS:
WASD/ ARROW KEYS - MOVE
SPACEBAR - DODGE ROLL
LMB - SHOOT (Aim towards Cursor)

Music By Bensound: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/dubstep
